name: The 3D-Rad Megapack
description:
Welcome everyone, nice people of Itch.io.

What you will find in this .rar is all the 3D-Rad games i've ever worked on, with the exception of Tiska Buska, that you can still find on Steam.

I decided to unpublish the pages for each game and put them all together, because their individual value, as my experience progressed, in my eyes didn't feel like it made them worth of such a "honor", so to speak. 

It also helps to categorize better the games in my library that crash when you look at them too hard and those that work relatively fine, so that people don't get the wrong idea about my work and better understand that these games exist in their own, deraged, universe, instead of being representative of my skills as a designer. 

Ok, i'm doing a lot of trash talk here. Jokes aside, part of me is still very proud of making these games, despite their flaws, both technical and in their core design, and if you can look past the fuckery of the old ass engine i used to make them, if you can enjoy at least a tiny bit of what i'm offering here, then it'll all be worth it. 

Have a good day.

-Nukadamo
